articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: England great Anderson considering white ball return
articles.description: James Anderson says he is "still fit enough" to continue his career as he considers a move into white ball cricket.
articles.content:
"I might be in a bit of denial because I'm well aware I won't play for England again, but I've still not made a decision on my actual cricket career," Anderson told the Press Association.

articles.title: Smith will be 'world-class for long period' - Bell

articles.content:
